## Abundance Boxplots

#### Expression Matrix Only

Cognostics must be: N, Mean, Median, CV 

```{r}
trelliData <- as.trelliData.edata(e_data = lipid_pos_edata,
                                  edata_cname = "Lipid",
                                  omics_type = "lipidData")

trelli_panel_by(trelliData = trelliData, panel = "Lipid") %>% 
   trelli_abundance_boxplot(test_mode = TRUE, 
                            test_example = 1:10, 
                            cognostics = c("sample count", "mean abundance", "median abundance", "cv abundance"))
```
